data.pricing_trends: Prices tend to spike during the holiday season (late December through early January) and reduce in the shoulder months of late September and early October.
data.booking_windows: For the best deals, travelers should book 2â€“3 months in advance, particularly for peak holiday periods.
data.demand: Iceland remains a top destination for Northern Lights tourism, with increasing demand in recent years, especially among European travelers.
data.competition: Alternative destinations include Norway and Finland for similar Northern Lights experiences, though Iceland remains famous for its unique landscapes and experiences.
